name: Confessional of Sin
description:
This is a one day and a half game jam and the theme is using sound into the gameplay.

The Confessional of Sin is puzzle game by listening people's words to find out the murderer. Player as a detector to listen the confess of the county's people  by acting  a priest. Detecting the clues and find the murdered!

This game created by Even, Heino (Haining Kong), Joon, Link and Mike.
